ps.plone.mlstiles
=================

Plone add-on which extends the `Propertyshelf`_ `MLS Embedding`_ with tiles for `collective.cover`_.

Read the full documentation at `<http://psplonemlstiles.readthedocs.org/en/latest>`_.


Mostly Harmless
---------------
